title: Basic Usage
findIntroStr: Used to jump to the specified position on the page

title: Fixed mode
content: Set the is-affix attribute to true so that the anchor does not scroll with the page.
findIntroStr: Used to jump to the specified position on the page

title: Rolling Container
content: Use the container-id attribute to specify the scrolling container. link-click listens to anchor click events and prevents the default browser behavior. Implement intra-page redirection in single-page hash routing mode so that the page scrolls only in the specified container. Set the custom class name through the mask-class attribute to highlight the scrolling target element
findIntroStr: Used to jump to the specified position on the page

title: change event
content: on-change event. Callback is triggered when the anchor link changes.
findIntroStr: Used to jump to the specified position on the page
